summary: Simply replaces the fire atronach with a blue one.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the armor texture, body color and the trail the flame atronach creates.
It does not replace the texture of her fireballs and fire attacks, since those texture are used by other things and i don't know how to change that yet.

Note for people with low specs computers: i used the offical HD texture as base to make my mod, the textures have higher resolutions and may cause lags if your computer doesn't handle it well.

It works together with the flame atronach model in the "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51560/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D51560%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Better Shaped Female Creatures[/url]" mod , if you give his mod higher priority in skyrims Data feautre.
BUT, the speculariy colors won't be the same on his model and the glow effect is not there either. No idea what he did, but it just ain't working.
[i](also works with other models, if others even exist)[/i]
author: MrFunreal
